## Folders containing the files with the extension of interest
```{r, echo = FALSE, message=FALSE, comment=NA}
for (i in dir_list){
    a <- list.files(path = i, pattern = "\\.shp$")
    if (length(a) > 0){
      print("FOLDER:")
      print(i)
      print("FILES:")
      print(a)
    } 
  } 
```
